name: Fighting Magical Girls RPG Women Defense
name_original: Fighting Magical Girls RPG Women Defense
description:
◆Synopsis◆

Kaede Sunafuji returns home from her part-time job and encounters a man in full tights attacking a woman.
When Kaede tries to save her and is about to be attacked herself, Shinko called out to her and transforms her into a magical girl.
After that, Kaede use her power to defeat Sex Fiend and prevent them from conquering this world.

◆Feature◆



・You can raise movement speed in dungeon and battle speed.
・Characters' picture during battle will change according to current status.
・Have sex to earn money and for training purposes outside of battle.
